attributes.action: Ban the Grand Nation and cruel Horse Racing!
attributes.additional_details:
Please help us by signing this petition to ban this awful “sport” and stop harming defensless Horses.

So far 4 horses have been disclosed to have been killed in this years Grand National.
attributes.background:
Every year Horses are horrifically treated and badly injured, breaking necks and legs,  some are shot in the head because of Vet bills\No use and this to the racing community is the “best way” 

I do not see how whipping horses until they bleed in 2019 acceptable. IT IS ANIMAL CRUELTY!!
